formName: Testing version for path builds, will be used to overwrite SC1 when we are happy.

sections.title: Have you got evidence to show your organisation has the funds toÂ operate the proposed establishment or agency?

fields.infoText: You will need to upload evidence of your organisation's finance to show it has enough funds to run and maintain the social care establishment or agency.

You will need to upload these types of evidence:

- financial reference from your bank
-  business plan 
-  cash-flow forecast
- company's last 2 annual reports and accounts  (if you have them)
- company's last 2 annual accounts  (if you have them)

choices: No I do not have evidence

sections.title: You don't have the right documents to continue with this application

fields.label: Ofsted will not be able to consider your application without these documents to show you are able to run a social care establishment or agency.
fields.infoText: Ofsted will not be able to consider your application without these documents.

sections.title: What type of business do you want to apply as?

fields.label: bisInfo1
fields.infoText: We must know your business type to register all the authorised individuals, establishment or agency and branches that plan to provide a social care service.

optionHelpText: Including charities, local councils and limited companies
These are individuals and groups of them who haven't registered their business with Companies House
This includes limited partnerships and limited liability partnerships (LLP)

sections.title: Are you a local council?
What type of agency or establishment are you applying to register?

fields.label: What type of agency or establishment are you applying to register?
choices: Residential holiday scheme for disabled children

sections.title: Are you applying to register a school as a children's home?

fields.label: edCH
fields.infoText: This can be an existing or planned school that  you plan to provide boarding for more than 295 days.

fields.shortName: Register educational establishment as children's home

sections.title: What is your school's Department for Education (DfE) number?

fields.label: DfEInfo
fields.infoText: We need your DfE number to let the Department for Education know that you have applied to register as a children's home.

fields.label: How do I find my DfE number?
fields.infoText: You can find your DfE number at the  [find and compare schools service](https://www.gov.uk/school-performance-tables) .

fields.label: DfE number
fields.helpText: It's 7 digits in this format, 689/1234

sections.title: Do you plan to buy a children's social care establishment or agency?
Is the existing children's establishment or agency you will buy registered with Ofsted?
Details of establishment or agency you will buy

fields.label: Ofsted registration number (URN)
fields.helpText: It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

sections.title: Details of establishment or agency you will buy
Address of establishment or agency you will buy

fields.infoText: We may contact you using these details  when checking your application

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: Include area code, for example 020 7960 0000

sections.title: Have you applied to register a children's social care establishment or agency with Ofsted before?

fields.helpText: We need to know this so we can check to see if you are already registered in our records.

sections.title: Was the application made before 30 September 2010?
Details of your previous application

fields.label: How do I find my Ofsted URN?
fields.infoText:
It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. 

For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  

From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

fields.label: Details of previous application
fields.helpText: Include date of application, establishment or agency name and address

sections.title: Do you have the finance available to run your establishment or agency?

fields.infoText: We need to make sure that you will have continued access to funds to fulfil your duties and obligations as a registered social care provider.

fields.label: Provide a summary of your cash-flow forecast, business plan and annual accounts that shows you can make a profit from your business. Do not include personal or financial information, like your National Insurance number or credit card details.

fields.infoText:
Upload these types of evidence as a single document using headings to identify each document within the single document:

- financial reference from your bank
-  business plan 
-  cash-flow forecast
- company's last 2 annual reports and accounts (if you have them)
- company's last 2 annual accounts  (if you have them)

fields.helpText: We accept files up to 5mb in size in formats like .gif, .jpg, .xls

fields.infoText: We are unlikely to accept your application to register if the establishment or agency has ceased to be financially viable, or is likely to cease to be so within the next 6 months.

sections.title: Does your organisation have the finance available to run your establishment or agency?

fields.infoText: We need to make sure that you will have continued access to funds to fulfil your duties and obligations as a registered social care provider.

fields.label: Provide a summary of your cash-flow forecast, business plan and annual accounts that shows you can make a profit from your business. Do not include personal or financial information, like your National Insurance number or credit card details.

fields.infoText:
Upload these types of evidence as a single document, using headings to identify each document within the single document:

- financial reference from your bank
-  business plan

- company's last 2 annual reports (if you have them)
- company's last 2 annual accounts  (if you have them)

fields.helpText: We accept files up to 5mb in size in formats like .gif, .jpg, .xls

fields.infoText: We are unlikely to accept your application to register if the establishment or agency has ceased to be financially viable, or is likely to cease to be so within the next 6 months.

fields.infoText: We need to know this to check the details of the establishment or agency against records we hold.

sections.title: When will you open the establishment or agency?

fields.label: When will you open the establishment or agency?
fields.infoText: We will use this information to consider your application. We cannot guarantee to process your application before your target opening date.

fields.label: Opening date
fields.helpText: Enter the date in this format dd/mm/yyyy

sections.title: Have you ever been registered or given a licence to run children and social care services by law?

fields.infoText:
We want to know if you have provided any of these services before:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

sections.title: Have you ever had an application refused or registration cancelled to provide children and social care services?

fields.infoText:
We want to know if your previous application to provide any of these services have been refused or registration cancelled to check your eligibility to be a social care provider:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

sections.title: Tell us about your refused or cancelled application with Ofsted or another organisation

fields.infoText:
Provide details of the previous application including:

- information about the type of service provided
- dates of application or registration
- reasons why the application was refused or the registration cancelled
- whether this was by Ofsted or another organisation
- any other detail you think is relevant

fields.label: How do I find the URN of my refused establishment or agency?
fields.infoText:
It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted.

From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

sections.title: Have you obtained the required planning permission? Or do you have evidence from the local authority to confirm that planning permission is not required?

fields.label: What evidence should I provide?
fields.infoText:
You need to provide either:

* copy of planning permission granted

* certificate of lawfulness

* copy of a planning application

* evidence that planning permission is not required

choices: Yes I will upload a copy
Yes I will post a copy

sections.title: Upload your planning document

fields.label: Upload your planning document here
fields.helpText: We accept files up to 5mb  in size if formats like .jpg, .gif, .xml

sections.title: Post your planning documents

fields.infoText:
You need to post the documents with a cover note that states the name and address of your application. 

Send your application to this postal address:



Applications team

Ofsted

Piccadilly Gate

Store Street

Manchester

M1 2WD

sections.title: Will your agency provide any of these services?

fields.label: Will your agency provide any of these services?
fields.helpText: Tick all the services that your agency will provide.
choices: Support, including mediation services, for contact between children who have been adopted, or who live with or have been matched with potential adopters, and their former families
Therapy services to help children with their adopted families, potential families or former families
Relationship support services to help sustain a relationship between the adoptive parents and the children
Mitigation support services where there is or could be a disruption in an adoption, or placement for adoptionSecond selectable choice
Support to adoption agencies in preparing and training parents who want to adopt
optionHelpText: Intermediary services: providing support to adults who have been adopted, and to their families, including helping them to find out about adoption and arrange contact if appropriate
This includes art or play therapy
This includes training parents so that they can meet the child's special needs
This includes mediation services and organising meetings to discuss disruptions

sections.title: What are your arrangements for children to raise questions and concerns about the holiday scheme?
Who is the proposed registered manager of the establishment or agency?

fields.infoText: The manager is the person who has day-to-day management of the establishment or agency.

The manager must submit an SC2 form for the proposed registered manager.

The manager must have had all their checks completed before we can make a decision about your registration as a provider. We make a decision about your registration at the same time as we decide the manager's application for registration.

We do not register the manager of a voluntary adoption agency and they do not have to complete an SC2 form. But their details should be completed on this page so that we know who they are.

choices: The proposed registered manager has submitted a completed SC2 form.

fields.helpText: This means all checks specified in The Adoption Support Agencies (England) and Adoption Agencies (Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations 2005 (Regulation 9) .

sections.title: Upload your procedures and policies

fields.infoText:
You need to upload the following procedures and policies as a single document, using headings to identify each policy within the single document:



-Accident and missing resident procedure

-Safeguarding policy

-Children's guide

-Prevention of bullying policy

-Complaints procedure

fields.helpText: We accept documents of 5MB or less in the following formats .jpg, .gif etc.

fields.infoText: You must enter the details of someone who is authorised to sign this declaration.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example, director or company secretary

fields.infoText: By submitting this form, you declare and agree that

- the information that you have submitted is true to the best of your knowledge and complete

- the details you provided in the service you are applying to register in this application form the conditions of your registration with Ofsted

- to notify Ofsted of any changes to the information on this form which may affect my suitability to provide social care.

- all the information you have given on this application form is true to the best of your knowledge and belief

- you as an individual who is providing the service or your organisation has enough funds to fulfil your duties and obligations as a registered social care agency or establishment

- every person who works, or is intended to work for the purposes of the establishment or agency who has regular contact with children or access to sensitive information about children, has an enhanced Disclosure and Barring Service certificate, where they are eligible for one

You may be prosecuted and your application refused if you deliberately give untrue or missing information.

Your application is not complete until you have paid the application fee

Ofsted will carry out checks and using the information provided from the checks and this application form as explained above

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

fields.label: What happens next
fields.infoText:
We have sent your application to the registration team.

The responsible and registered individuals, partners and managers need to complete an SC2 application form.

They will contact you either to confirm that your application register has been accepted and is ready to be considered, or to ask for more information.

If you need to contact us about your application, you can call our helpline on 0300 123 1231. We are open from 8am to 6pm (Monday to Friday).
